016package com.fns.grivet.model;
017
018import java.sql.Timestamp;
019import java.time.Instant;
020import java.time.LocalDate;
021import java.time.LocalDateTime;
022import java.time.ZoneId;
023import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
024import java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor;
025
026import org.json.JSONArray;
027import org.json.JSONObject;
028
029
030public class ValueHelper {
031
032        public static Object getValue(AttributeType attributeType, Object source) {
033                Object value = null;
034                String stringValue = String.valueOf(source);
035                // conversion takes place here...
036                switch (attributeType) {
037                case BIG_INTEGER:
038                        value = Long.valueOf(stringValue);
039                        break;
040                case ISO_DATE:
041                        value = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE.format(LocalDate.parse(stringValue));
042                        break;
043                case ISO_DATETIME:
044                        value = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME.format(LocalDateTime.parse(stringValue));
045                        break;
046                case ISO_INSTANT:
047                        value = "%s%s".formatted(stringValue, "Z");
048                        break;
049                case DECIMAL:
050                        value = Double.valueOf(stringValue);
051                        break;
052                case INTEGER:
053                        value = Integer.valueOf(stringValue);
054                        break;
055                case VARCHAR:
056                        value = stringValue;
057                        break;
058                case TEXT:
059                        value = stringValue;
060                        break;
061                case JSON_BLOB:
062                        if (stringValue.startsWith("{")) {
063                                value = new JSONObject(stringValue);
064                        }
065                        if (stringValue.startsWith("[")) {
066                                value = new JSONArray(stringValue);
067                        }
068                        break;
069                case BOOLEAN:
070                        int i = Integer.valueOf(stringValue);
071                        if (i == 1) {
072                                value = true;
073                        } else {
074                                value = false;
075                        }
076                        break;
077                default:
078                        value = stringValue;
079                        break;
080                }
081                return value;
082        }
083
084        public static Object toValue(AttributeType attributeType, Object source) {
085                Object value = null;
086                String stringValue = String.valueOf(source);
087                // conversion takes place here...
088                TemporalAccessor ta;
089                switch (attributeType) {
090                case BIG_INTEGER:
091                        value = Long.valueOf(stringValue);
092                        break;
093                case ISO_DATE:
094                        ta = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE.parse(stringValue);
095                        LocalDate ld = LocalDate.from(ta);
096                        value = java.sql.Date.valueOf(ld);
097                        break;
098                case ISO_DATETIME:
099                        ta = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME.parse(stringValue);
100                        LocalDateTime ldt = LocalDateTime.from(ta);
101                        value = Timestamp.valueOf(ldt);
102                        break;
103                case ISO_INSTANT:
104                        ta = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT.parse(stringValue);
105                        Instant in = Instant.from(ta);
106                        value = Timestamp.valueOf(LocalDateTime.ofInstant(in, ZoneId.of("UTC")));
107                        break;
108                case DECIMAL:
109                        value = Double.valueOf(stringValue);
110                        break;
111                case INTEGER:
112                        value = Integer.valueOf(stringValue);
113                        break;
114                case VARCHAR:
115                        value = stringValue;
116                        break;
117                case TEXT:
118                        value = stringValue;
119                        break;
120                case JSON_BLOB:
121                        value = stringValue;
122                        break;
123                case BOOLEAN:
124                        boolean b = Boolean.parseBoolean(stringValue);
125                        if (b) {
126                                value = 1;
127                        } else {
128                                value = 0;
129                        }
130                        break;
131                default:
132                        value = stringValue;
133                        break;
134                }
135                return value;
136        }
137
138}
